name: ecommerce-copywriting-assistant-frontend
description: A frontend application that runs directly in the browser using esm.sh for dependencies and Babel Standalone for TSX transpilation. No server-side build or npm install is strictly necessary for the app itself, but this package.json helps CI/CD platforms.

scripts.start: echo "This app runs directly in the browser. Serve index.html with a static server."
scripts.build: echo "No build step required for this setup."
